news.title: FSFE Newsletter
news.body: Topics: Mythbusting MS-OOXML, First Swedish Fellowship meeting held in Gothenburg, Free Software on Exit festival 2007, Novi Sad, Serbia, Freedom in the hills: the Bergtagung, GNU GPL licence confirmed once again in a court of law, Submit Free Software projects to the Troph√©es du Libre, Ongoing work of spreading GNU GPLv3 understanding, Tell a friend about the Fellowship, share this newsletter.
